content.text: Win more business and reduce risk using ACC for Preconstruction

content.fontFamily: Artifakt Legend,Arial,-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif,"Apple Color Emoji","Segoe UI Emoji","Segoe UI Symbol"

content.text: Get access to multiple best-in-class cloud-based preconstruction solutions at one price. Centralize bid management with BuildingConnected or increase confidence in your estimates with Autodesk Takeoff and ProEst while streamlining subcontractors’ qualification with TradeTapp.

cards.title: Project access anywhere
cards.description: Complete tasks effortlessly with a best-in-class mobile app built for the field.

cards.title: Flexible to meet your needs
cards.description: We can support your business needs with our flexible user, project, and account-based pricing.

cards.title: Help when you need it
cards.description: Your success is our top priority. Our expert support team is there for you 24hrs a day M-F.

cards.title: Safe and secure
cards.description: Your data is secure with us. Autodesk Construction Cloud has enterprise-grade security.

cards.title: Training that fits your schedule
cards.description: We know your time is precious. Learn Autodesk Construction Cloud with free, 5-minute videos.

cards.title: Expert services for success
cards.description: Need extra support? Our delivery services team is ready to help your business succeed.

body.title: Leverage the power of Autodesk Construction Cloud

body.headline: ### Have questions or need pricing on additional products?

metaData.title: BuildingConnected Pricing | Autodesk Construction Cloud
metaData.description: Explore pricing for BuildingConnected to streamline bid and risk management with tools that leverage the largest network of construction professionals.
